Title: CBRViewer
Description:
CBReader is a small application to visualize .cbr or .cbz type comic ebooks.
[Source code is in c# and uses WPF]
HomeWiki:
Project Description
CBReader is a small application to visualize .cbr or .cbz type comic ebooks.
[Source code is in c# and uses WPF]

CBReader is a small application to visualize .cbr or .cbz type comic ebooks. I saw a very nice one on codeplex (wfpbookreader.codeplex.com). It looks very nice and has many features, but I decided to build a small and simple one that can do much less.

Inspirations came from (in random order):
  • Microsoft Developer Network http://msdn.microsoft.com
  • C.B.R http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/294452/C-B-R*
  • Sacha Barber http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/37366/Styling-A-ScrollViewer-Scrollbar-In-WPF
  • immortalus http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/437237/WPF-Grid-Column-and-Row-Hiding
  • WPF Minimal Button Styling http://gregandora.wordpress.com/2011/02/06/wpf-minimal-button-styling/
  • WPF Loading Wait Adorner (Jeremy Hutchinson) http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/57984/WPF-Loading-Wait-Adorner
  • 7-Zip http://www.7-zip.org/
  • MVVM Light Toolkit http://www.galasoft.ch/mvvm/
  • NLog advanced .NET Logging http://nlog-project.org/
